definition.de: Noch nicht entwickelte Menschen, gewöhnlich bis zum Alter der Pubertät
definition.dk: Personer i fasen mellem fødsel og voksen alder.
definition.en-GB: Young people, usually pre-pubescent, who are legally considered minors and are in a guardianship relationship with adults
definition.en-US: Young people, usually pre-pubescent, who are legally considered minors and are in a guardianship relationship with adults
definition.pt-BR: Pessoas imaturas, geralmente até a idade da puberdade.
definition.pt-PT: Pessoas imaturas, geralmente até a idade da puberdade.
definition.se: Personer under skedet mellan födelsen och vuxen ålder.
definition.zh-Hans: 通常指未到青春期的未成年人
